siYuan.html:
线程不安全示例
​
如果多个线程对同一个共享数据进行访问而不采取同步操作的话，那么操作的结果是不一致的。
​
以下代码演示了 1000 个线程同时对 cnt 执行自增操作，操作结束之后它的值有可能小于 1000。
​
java
public class ThreadUnsafeExample { private int cnt = 0; public void add() { cnt++; } public int get() { return cnt; } } public static void main(String[] args) throws InterruptedException { final int threadSize = 1000; ThreadUnsafeExample example = new ThreadUnsafeExample(); final CountDownLatch countDownLatch = new CountDownLatch(threadSize); ExecutorService executorService = Executors.newCachedThreadPool(); for (int i = 0; i < threadSize; i++) { executorService.execute(() -> { example.add(); countDownLatch.countDown(); }); } countDownLatch.await(); executorService.shutdown(); System.out.println(example.get()); } 997 // 结果总是小于1000
​
